name: Mattel Monster High Freaky Fashion Curtain Panels, Set of 2

reviews.name: Mattel Monster High Freaky Fashion Curtain Panels, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: I added the panels to my daughter's Monster High bathroom. Vibrant colors; great value. I was able to decorate the entire bathroom for less than $80 from products that I found at Walmart.com.
reviews.title: Mattel Monster High Freaky Fashion Curtain Panels

reviews.name: Mattel Monster High Freaky Fashion Curtain Panels, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: The Monster High Fashion Curtain looks exactly like the picture. It was just what I needed for the finish touch of my 6 year old daughter Monster High Themed Bedroom.
reviews.title: Fangtastic :-P

reviews.name: Mattel Monster High Freaky Fashion Curtain Panels, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are great! My daughter loves them. I love that you get a pair, for such an excellent price. We have 3 sets. Washes really well.
reviews.title: Great value & Quality
